/* com.innobiz.orange.web.wa.dao.WaCarImgDDao.selectWaCarImgD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM ( SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.CAR_KND_NO, T.IMG_PATH, T.IMG_WDTH, T.IMG_HGHT, T.MODR_UID, T.MOD_DT,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM WA_CAR_IMG_D T
AND T.CAR_KND_NO = #{carKndNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.CAR_KND_NO
) N ) M WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND RNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
